title: Missing Export and Global sectoins in .wasm
body:
There is no Export and Global sections in the produced .wasm file with `rustc 1.29.0-nightly (874dec25e 2018-07-21)` while it is expected.

cc @alexcrichton 
steps to reproduce the bug:
`Cargo.toml`:
```
[package]
name = "wasm-run"
version = "0.1.0"

[lib]
crate-type = ["cdylib"]
```
`src/lib.rs`:

```
#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn run() {}
```

`.cargo/config` file:
```
[build]
rustflags = ["-C", "link-args=--relocatable --no-gc-sections"]
```

`wasm-objdump -h` output:

```
     Type start=0x0000000b end=0x000001a7 (size=0x0000019c) count: 59
   Import start=0x000001a9 end=0x000001c1 (size=0x00000018) count: 1
 Function start=0x000001c4 end=0x00000c20 (size=0x00000a5c) count: 2650
    Table start=0x00000c22 end=0x00000c29 (size=0x00000007) count: 1
   Memory start=0x00000c2b end=0x00000c2e (size=0x00000003) count: 1
     Elem start=0x00000c31 end=0x00000e54 (size=0x00000223) count: 1
     Code start=0x00000e58 end=0x0004a412 (size=0x000495ba) count: 2650
     Data start=0x0004a416 end=0x000660f1 (size=0x0001bcdb) count: 512
   Custom start=0x000660f5 end=0x000cab05 (size=0x00064a10) ".debug_info"
   Custom start=0x000cab07 end=0x000cab49 (size=0x00000042) ".debug_macinfo"
   Custom start=0x000cab4d end=0x000e4fc9 (size=0x0001a47c) ".debug_pubtypes"
   Custom start=0x000e4fcd end=0x0010aa13 (size=0x00025a46) ".debug_ranges"
   Custom start=0x0010aa17 end=0x001105b3 (size=0x00005b9c) ".debug_abbrev"
   Custom start=0x001105b7 end=0x0014d30f (size=0x0003cd58) ".debug_line"
   Custom start=0x0014d313 end=0x0021a44d (size=0x000cd13a) ".debug_str"
   Custom start=0x0021a451 end=0x0024a4e9 (size=0x00030098) ".debug_pubnames"
   Custom start=0x0024a4ed end=0x0028f5d4 (size=0x000450e7) "linking"
```
